title: 3 lvling bot in one game?
body:
just had a quick game before work, encounter 3 bots
this is getting ridiculous
Richard KIA Jeff, and all the other "KIA" chars I have been reporting each individual char I encounter many times
yes they still keep on popping up
I am guess Riot isn't doing anything about those lvling bots?

replies.body:
I've been getting swarms of them too x-x
But I think Riot might be doing someing as I've noticed the bot's behavior change somewhat recently from the normal just AFKing.

yes, they move around lanes and die lol
i'd rather they afk at spawn

Hey there,

The best thing to do is to keep reporting the accounts in question under "Cheating" provide as much detail as possible in the report.

If you wish to submit a secondary report along with any further evidence you have, feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward it to the correct team.

Thanks, keep up the good work.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
